Summary: Standing outside speaking with friend saw small blacked out disc against night sky preceeding from west to northeast approximately 200-300 feet above ground
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Fontana
There were no other sightings in Fontana on or around August 8th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsobserved disc above neighboorhood approximately a half mile away, craft was blacked out noticeable due to city lights and bright night sky. Craft traveled from a north to northeast direction, while making a circular turn, then dissapearing in the northeast sky as it slowly gained altitude. Prior to this the disc shaped object traveled the distance of approximately 15 miles horizantally before slowly rising out of sight. Incredible, well formed disc shape, very easily seen, no question of shape or form. Incredible experience documented by myself and friend.
